author: USA TODAY, Dr. Robert M. Wachter, Opinion contributor
title: Doctor: Here's how San Francisco is beating the odds on the coronavirus — so far
description: If we let our guard down, resume normal activities too soon, fail to do aggressive testing and quarantine, we risk planting seeds for later tragedies.
content:
Our leaders acted early. But if we get complacent, resume normal life too soon and don't aggressively test and quarantine, we risk future tragedies.
Like a wildfire spraying hot embers, the coronavirus pandemic is now flaring in communities around the countr… [+6337 chars]
